**[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 26 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21 [Grabbles](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2268) **Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 125 **Perception** +7; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +7, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +4, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +8 **Str** +1 **Dex** +4 **Con** +3 **Int** +0 **Wis** +1 **Cha** +3 **Self-Loathing** ([emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) A mitflit's self-loathing makes it easy to influence. It takes a –4 penalty to its Will DC against checks to [Coerce](/Actions.aspx?ID=52), [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53), [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50), and [Request](/Actions.aspx?ID=51).
**Vermin Empathy** Mitflits can use Diplomacy to Make an Impression on and Request things of arthropods (insects, spiders, scorpions, crabs, and similar invertebrate animals). Most arthropods have a starting attitude of indifferent to mitflits. **Items** [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Trident](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45) --- **AC** 18 **Fort** +7 **Ref** +10 **Will** +5 **HP** 35 **Weaknesses** cold iron 2 --- **Speed** 20 feet; climb 20 feet **Melee** trident +7 ([thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 1d8+3 piercing **Ranged** trident +10 ([thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 1d8+3 piercing **Primal Innate Spells** DC 17 - **Cantrips (1st)** [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229) - **1st** [Bane](/Spells.aspx?ID=18) - **2nd** [Speak with Animals](/Spells.aspx?ID=293) (at will; arthropods only) **Ride Tick** ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) Grabbles can use Diplomacy to [Command an Animal](/Actions.aspx?ID=58) when riding Tickleback. **Vengeful Anger** ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) As long as it isn't [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19), a mitflit gains a +2 status bonus to damage rolls against a creature that has previously damaged or tormented it.
name: Grabbles
